text:
Macarena Olona Choclán (born 14 May 1979) is a Spanish politician. She is a member of the far-right Vox party. Since 2019, she has served as a member of the Congress of Deputies. She was born in Alicante.
On 12 March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, it was made clear that Olona had tested positive to COVID-19.
